special_powers.name: AVENGERS ASSEMBLE!
special_powers.description: Captain America can use Leadership. When he does and the result is 6, you may place a friendly character with the Avengers keyword, a lower point value, and within 4 squares adjacent to him, but only if you remove the action token from that character.

special_powers.name: SUPER SOLDIER & SHIELD
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn choose either Combat Reflexes or Energy Shield/Deflection. Captain America can use that power until the beginning of your next turn.

special_powers.name: TAKE DOWN
special_powers.description: Captain America can use Incapacitate as if he had 2 targets. When he does and hits 2 characters, he may give one hit character 2 action tokens instead of giving each of them one. If that character can't be given the second action token, deal it 1 penetrating damage instead.

special_powers.name: ENHANCED REPULSORS
special_powers.description: All of Iron Man's attacks generate knock back.

special_powers.name: INVENTING ON THE FLY
special_powers.description: Once per turn, Iron Man can use Outwit or Perplex.

special_powers.name: CALL THE STORM & TEAR OPEN THE SKY
special_powers.description: Thor can use Super Strength. When Thor targets and hits more than 1 opposing character with an attack, targets of the attack are dealt penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: WHATEVER A SPIDER CAN
special_powers.description: When Spider-Man is the target of a ranged combat attack, he can use Super Senses, but evades the attack on a result of 4 - 6.

special_powers.name: STRENGTH AND SPEED OF A SPIDER
special_powers.description: Spider-Man can use Incapacitate and the Move and Attack ability. When he uses the Move and Attack ability, he modifies his attack value by -1 instead of -2.

special_powers.name: NO MORE MUTANTS
special_powers.description: Once per game, give Scarlet Witch a double power action and choose a team ability.  Any other character that can use that team ability must roll a d6 that can't be rerolled and if the result is 1 - 5, that character can't use the chosen team ability for the rest of the game.

special_powers.name: MYSTICAL WARDS
special_powers.description: Scarlet Witch can use Energy Shield/Deflection.  When Scarlet Witch is hit with an attack, the roll is ignored and the attacker must roll again.  This new roll can't be rerolled or ignored.

special_powers.name: CASTING SPELLS
special_powers.description: Scarlet Witch can use Perplex, Probability Control, and Support.

special_powers.name: YOU DON'T GET TO GIVE UP
special_powers.description: Once during your turn, another friendly character within 4 squares that shares a keyword with Black Panther can use Willpower.

special_powers.name: KING OF WAKANDA
special_powers.description: Black Panther can use Empower, Leadership, and Outwit. When he uses Leadership and the result is 6, in addition to the normal effects he may remove an action token from himself.

special_powers.name: YOU THINK YOU KNOW ME
special_powers.description: When Professor X does not have 2 action tokens, he can use Shape Change.

special_powers.name: I CAN'T LET YOU DO THIS
special_powers.description: Professor X can use Mind Control and is not dealt unavoidable damage from it. Opposing characters within range must be given double power actions instead of power actions.

special_powers.name: ONLY WHEN I HAVE TO
special_powers.description: Professor X can use Mastermind. When he does, he may divide the damage dealt between 2 adjacent friendly characters if they each share a keyword with him.

special_powers.name: I LOVE ALL OF YOU
special_powers.description: Professor X can use Empower, Enhancement, and Leadership. When he uses Leadership and succeeds, he may remove up to one action token from each adjacent friendly character with the X-Men keyword.

special_powers.name: ONGOING OPTIC BLASTS
special_powers.description: Cyclops can use Force Blast and Running Shot. When he uses Running Shot, after actions resolve, he can use Force Blast as a free action.

special_powers.name: LET'S PUT THE WORLD BACK ON TRACK
special_powers.description: Cyclops can use Leadership and Outwit. When he uses Leadership, adjacent characters with a shared keyword are considered to have a lower point value.

special_powers.name: SCOTT CAN HANDLE IT
special_powers.description: Emma Frost's powers can't be countered. When a friendly character with the X-Men keyword is more than four squares away, Emma Frost can use Sidestep.

special_powers.name: IT'S HER DECISION
special_powers.description: Emma Frost can use Outwit and has a range value of 7.

special_powers.name: DIAMOND FORM
special_powers.description: Emma Frost can use Exploit Weakness, Impervious, and Shape Change.

special_powers.name: IMPERIUS REX!
special_powers.description: When Namor is hit with an attack or given a second action token, put a Rage token on his card. Before Namor rolls for an attack, you may remove a Rage token from his card so that the attack deals penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: ENTRENCHED RECOVERY
special_powers.description: Namor can use Toughness. When Namor occupies water terrain, he can use Regeneration and, when it's not your turn, opposing characters can't draw a line of fire to him.

special_powers.name: I BELIEVE IN THE X-MEN
special_powers.description: Colossus can use Charge and Plasticity. If he has two action tokens, adjacent friendly characters that can use the X-Men team ability can use that team ability as a free action.

special_powers.name: STEEL-SKINNED X-MAN
special_powers.description: Colossus can use Defend and Impervious.

special_powers.name: TELEPORTATION DISKS
special_powers.description: Give Magik a power action and choose an adjacent character. Place Magik in any square within range, place the chosen character in an adjacent square, and roll a d6. On a result of 1-4, the chosen character can't be given a non-free action until your next turn.

special_powers.name: I'VE BEATEN BELASCO
special_powers.description: Magik deals penetrating damage to characters with the Mystical keyword.

special_powers.name: ARE YOU SURE ABOUT THIS, SCOTT?
special_powers.description: Magneto can use Energy Shield/Deflection and Telekinesis. During the beginning of your turn, if Magneto has two action tokens, he can use Telekinesis as a free action, but may only use it to place friendly characters.

special_powers.name: MAGNETIC FIELD
special_powers.description: Magneto can use Force Blast. When he has no action tokens, he can use it as a free action.

special_powers.name: ISLAND DEFENSE SYSTEMS
special_powers.description: When Danger has one action token, she can draw lines of fire and count squares for range from any square occupied by a friendly character with the Robot or Vehicle keyword.

special_powers.name: WARDEN OF UTOPIA
special_powers.description: Danger can use the Capture ability, but may not have more than 1 captive.

special_powers.name: POWER MIMIC
special_powers.description: Give Hope Summers a free action. Choose a standard power possessed by any character within 4 squares. Hope Summers can use that power until your next turn as if she had a range value of 6.

special_powers.name: JET PACK
special_powers.description: Hope Summers can use Charge and the Flight ability.

special_powers.name: SAVE HOPE
special_powers.description: Adjacent friendly characters named Hope Summers modify their defense value by +1 if not already modified by this effect.

special_powers.name: COMING AFTER ALL OF YOU
special_powers.description: Cable modifies his attack and damage values by +1 when attacking a character with the Avengers keyword or team ability.

special_powers.name: TIMESLIDE
special_powers.description: Cable can use Phasing/Teleport and Shape Change.

special_powers.name: THERE'S ALWAYS "PLAN B"
special_powers.description: Cable can use the Duo Attack ability. When he does, during the second attack, he can use Precision Strike.

special_powers.name: TEACHER & PUPIL
special_powers.description: During the beginning of your turn, give Lei-Kung the Thunderer a free action and choose a friendly character within 3 squares, with the Martial Artist keyword, and with a lower point value. The chosen character may modify either their attack or defense value by +1 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: STRIKES LIKE LIGHTNING
special_powers.description: Lei-Kung the Thunderer can use Charge, Flurry, and Plasticity.

special_powers.name: CRASHES LIKE THUNDER
special_powers.description: Lei-Kung the Thunderer can use Quake. When he does, hit characters are also given an action token.

special_powers.name: REVERT: HOPE SUMMERS
special_powers.description: Give White Phoenix Hope a free action and replace her with a AvX #016 Hope Summers on the same click number -2. The replacement character can't be given an action this turn.

special_powers.name: REBIRTH
special_powers.description: White Phoenix Hope can use Support. When she does, choose: Her attack value becomes 12 or do not subtract 2 from the result of the d6 roll to heal.

special_powers.name: HERE GOES NUTHIN'
special_powers.description: Phoenixbuster Iron Man's attacks deal penetrating damage if the target character is assigned a relic or a resource or possesses any of the following: "Giant damage symbol", "Colossal damage symbol", the Power Cosmic team ability, the Cosmic or Phoenix Force keyword, or the word Phoenix in its name as a separate word.

special_powers.name: POWER OF THE PHOENIX
special_powers.description: Dark Phoenix Cyclops can use the Multiattack ability. When he does and makes 2 attacks, the second attack deals penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: DRIVEN TO CHANGE THE WORLD
special_powers.description: When Dark Phoenix Cyclops KO's another character with an attack, remove an action token from him after actions resolve.

special_powers.name: WAVES OF DESTRUCTION
special_powers.description: Dark Phoenix Cyclops can use Energy Explosion and Pulse Wave. When he uses Pulse Wave and there is more than one character within the area of effect, his damage value becomes 7 minus his click number, minimum 2.

special_powers.name: LAST VESTIGE OF POWER
special_powers.description: When this click is revealed, stop turning the dial. Dark Phoenix Cyclops can't use the Multiattack ability and if he has already taken damage this turn, can't be dealt damage again.
This character can use Poison, Ranged Combat Expert and the Flight ability.
This character can use Poison, the Flight ability, and the Avengers, Defenders, and X-Men team abilities.
This character can use Invulnerability, Poison, and the Flight ability.
This character can use Poison, Telekinesis and the Flight ability.
This character can use Poison, the Flight ability, and the Mystics team ability.

special_powers.name: SHIELDING
special_powers.description: Avengers can use Energy Shield/Deflection and Invulnerability.

special_powers.name: COMBINED MIGHT
special_powers.description: Avengers can use Empower and Enhancement.
Use the asset ability of the character attached in position #1.
Use the asset ability of the character attached in position #2.
Use the asset ability of the character attached in position #3.
Use the asset ability of the character attached in position #4.
Use the asset ability of the character attached in position #5.

special_powers.name: NOW, WHEN YOU NEED SOMETHING
special_powers.description: Characters with one action token attacking X-Men modify their attack value by -1.

special_powers.name: ENDAGERED SPECIES
special_powers.description: If 5 team members are attached, X-Men can use Colossal Stamina.

special_powers.name: YOU CANNOT HURT US
special_powers.description: X-Men can use Super Senses and Toughness.

special_powers.name: X-MEN NEVER GIVE UP
special_powers.description: X-Men can use Outwit. If X-Men are adjacent to an opposing character, they can use Regeneration.
Use the asset ability of the character attached in position #1.
Use the asset ability of the character attached in position #2.
Use the asset ability of the character attached in position #3.
Use the asset ability of the character attached in position #4.
Use the asset ability of the character attached in position #5.
X-Men can use Barrier until your next turn. They can use it as a free action, but when they do, they may only place up to 2 terrain markers.
